id: scenario-value-scanner-young-adult-scenarios-workplace-organizational-personal agent helps maintain well-being during work pressure
title: Personal agent helps maintain well-being during work pressure
description: Personal agent helps maintain well-being during work pressure
content:
Scenario: Personal agent helps maintain well-being during work pressure
    Given Aisha's job is demanding
    And professional pressures are intense
    When work stress affects her health
    Then the personal_agent should prioritize her well-being
    And it should flag declining self-care patterns
    And it should remind her that personal health enables professional contribution
    And the system should validate self-care as essential, not optional
    And she should learn that sustainable work requires personal stewardship
    And wholeness should be preserved despite workplace demands
